name: Cranberry and Almond Pasta Salad
author: My Hot Southern Mess
summary: Sweet and tangy pasta salad filled with dried cranberries and almonds. Turkey can be used in place of the ham. Great served right away or chilled briefly.
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook the bow-tie pasta at a boil until cooked through yet tender, about 12 minutes; drain
Rinse the pasta in cold water until completely chilled; drain
Transfer cool pasta to a large mixing bowl
Toss the ham, celery, dried cranberries, and sliced almonds with the bow-tie pasta to mix evenly
Stir the mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, and sugar together in a bowl
Pour the mayonnaise dressing over the pasta mixture; toss to coat evenly
